wikipedia_page.main: Amy Parry-Williams (née Thomas; 18 December 1910 – 28 January 1988) was a Welsh singer and writer with a special interest in Welsh folk traditions. An active broadcaster, she was an early director of the Welsh television company HTV.Since 1958, she was known as Lady Parry-Williams, as her husband T. H. Parry-Williams was knighted. She was entitled to the courtesy title of Lady.
